title: Can non mahrams see the face of a deceased woman or man? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says is it permissible for non-mahrams to see the face of a deceased woman or a man as for the face of a woman who's deceased the aura of a person during his lifetime is the same as after his death or her death and therefore it is not permissible for non-mahrams to look at the face of a deceased woman even if she is old even if she is dead yes but still her aura remains to be our even after her death as for men as women can look at the face of men when they're alive they also can do that after their death and there's no problem in that
